title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the break up of Aaron Rodgers and WR Davante Adams and what this says about Rodgers at this point in his career. He praises Duke head coach Mike Kr for his ability to evolve over the years and remain as one of the elite college basketball programs in the country. He also warns one NFL team not to get tricked by their QB having success next season despite being average at best. Plus, Ryen Russillo from The Ringer joins the show to tell Colin why Chet Holmgren will still be the number 1 pick in the NBA draft despite a disappointing NCAA tournament. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
